Articles.Content:
I'm bubbleawsome. I could have sworn I had an account here, but I guess I didn't.

I've been enjoying the game since before the kraken bug was fixed. 0.14 I think, but I don't remember that well. I actually haven't logged near as many hours as my brother though, but he is the reason I remade my account. He managed to get his modded version to crash. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Honestly not sure I will spend tons of time around these forums, as I don't play as much as I used too, but I'm sure the time I do spend here will be amazing!

Thanks guys! I missed you by a bit, turns out I didn't automatically subscribe. I though it was taking forever for a mod to approve my post. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
